data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Guimaraes.
In the minute 3, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Free kick Braga.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bruno Duarte of Guimaraes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Braga's Fransergio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga push forward at Dom Afonso Henriques and David Carmo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guimaraes defence.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 17, In Guimaraes Braga attack through Fransergio. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Braga.
Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma breaks free at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Braga push upfield and Bruno Viana gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Guimaraes defence.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Braga.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Braga pushes forward through Paulinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Andre Andre (Guimaraes) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 28, Ricardo Esgaio puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Wenderson Galeno to set up the goal.
Fabio Verissimo awards Braga a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes's Bruno Duarte misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Andre Andre of Guimaraes is pulled up for offside.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Braga in the half of Guimaraes.
Braga drive upfield and Fransergio gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Attention is being given to Guimaraes’s Bruno Duarte and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 40, Guimaraes’s Bruno Duarte is on his feet again at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
In the minute 41, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 43, Wenderson Galeno for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Guimaraes.
Free kick Guimaraes.
At Dom Afonso Henriques, Braga are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Fabio Verissimo blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Fabio Verissimo signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Braga's half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 48, Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Fransergio for Braga drives towards goal at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabio Verissimo awards Braga a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Braga's Ricardo Horta gets in a shot on goal at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Braga.
Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Paulinho (Braga) gets a yellow card.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In the minute 57, Guimaraes's Marcus Edwards breaks free at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Braga to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Guimaraes's area.
In the minute 61, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's first substitution at Dom Afonso Henriques with Andre Horta replacing Iuri Medeiros.
In the minute 64, Guimaraes are pushing forward but Ricardo Quaresma's finish is wide of the goal.
Fabio Verissimo awards Braga a goal kick.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Braga are coming forward and Wenderson Galeno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andre Castro (Braga) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marcus Edwards for Guimaraes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Guimaraes to check on Matheus Magalhaes, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 72, Joao Henriques (Guimaraes) is making a first substitution, with Denis Poha replacing Andre Andre.
Braga's Matheus Magalhaes looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Rochinha for Guimaraes has been booked by Fabio Verissimo and receives a first yellow card.
Braga make their second substitution with Guilherme Schettine replacing Paulinho.
Al Musrati is replacing Andre Castro for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 75, Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
In Guimaraes Braga drive forward through Andre Horta. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Guimaraes's Bruno Duarte gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fabio Verissimo awards Braga a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Braga have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Denis Poha (Guimaraes) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 82, He's off! David Carmo is shown a red card.
Jorge Fernandes (Guimaraes) has been shown a straight red card by referee Fabio Verissimo.
Easah Suliman is booked for the home team.
In the minute 85, Fransergio (Braga) sees red and is sent off in Guimaraes!
In the minute 87, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Noah Jean Holm is replacing Silvio for the home team.
The home team have replaced Rochinha with Miguel Luis. This is the third substitution made today by Joao Henriques.
Vitor Tormena is replacing Wenderson Galeno for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's fifth substitution at Dom Afonso Henriques with Joao Novais replacing Ricardo Horta.
In the minute 89, Guimaraes drive forward but Noah Jean Holm is judged offside.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Braga close to the penalty box.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Braga's half.
9 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Guimaraes.
In Guimaraes, Bruno Duarte of Guimaraes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
Guilherme Schettine gets his shot on target but fails to score for Braga.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Throw-in for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Braga's Andre Horta is on target but unsuccessful.
Guilherme Schettine returns to the field for Braga after picking up a slight injury.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guimaraes attack but Noah Jean Holm's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In Guimaraes Braga attack through Guilherme Schettine. The finish is off target, however.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Zie Mohamed Ouattara for Guimaraes is whistled offside.
Goal kick for Braga at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Guilherme Schettine of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabio Verissimo awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Fabio Verissimo blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Fabio Verissimo waits before resuming play because Guilherme Schettine for Braga is still down.
